summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HavenWelfare application. All backend APIs (16/16) and frontend features working perfectly. Admin login, dashboard navigation, role-based access, and public donation portal all functional.
passed_tests: Admin login with provided credentials (brijesh.kr.dube@gmail.com / Haven@9874)
Landing page loads with proper navigation elements
Login page loads with email/password fields and forgot password link
Register page loads with role selection (doctor/patient)
Admin dashboard loads showing analytics cards
All admin management pages accessible (User Management, Rehab Centers, Addiction Types, Donations, Payment Settings, SMTP Settings, Audit Logs)
Forgot Password page loads with email input
Donor Portal (/donate) loads with patient selection and donation form
Backend API endpoints (16/16 tests passed): auth, admin analytics, user management, rehab centers CRUD, addiction types CRUD, donations, doctors, admin settings
Frontend-backend integration working (authentication, data loading, navigation)
